cases.query: Give me a short workflow to ask voice questions and get audio replies in Hindi for farmers.
cases.response_preview: Bhai, you can ask voice questions, it will be transcribed, then AI will respond, and you'll get audio playback in Hindi, helping you easily understand.

cases.query: Explain Kharif vs Rabi crops in India with examples and sowing windows.
cases.response_preview: In India, Kharif crops like paddy, maize, and soybean are sown during monsoon (June to September). Rabi crops like wheat, gram, and mustard are sown during winter (October to February).

cases.query: Current wheat MSP in India and how should farmers decide mandi sale timing?
cases.response_preview: Check local mandi rates for current wheat prices. For mandi sale timing, track market trends and government announcements to decide when to sell your wheat for the best price.

cases.query: Punjab mein gehu mein yellow rust ke lakshan aur turant upay batao.
cases.response_preview: Gehu mein yellow rust ke lakshan hain pili ya peeli dhabbiyan. Turant upay ke liye fungicide ka upyog karein, lekin ghanste samasyaon ke liye kisan visheshagya se salah lein.

cases.query: My cotton crop in Maharashtra has pink bollworm risk. Give integrated pest management steps.
cases.response_preview: For pink bollworm, use a mix of methods: plant resistant varieties, remove weeds, and use pheromone traps. Also, consider biological control and insecticides as a last resort. Consult an expert for serious issues.

cases.query: For paddy in eastern India, suggest irrigation and fertilizer schedule for tillering to panicle stage.
cases.response_preview: For paddy in eastern India, irrigate every 4-5 days during tillering. Apply urea at 20-25 kg/acre during tillering and 30-35 kg/acre at panicle initiation. Also, add phosphorus and potassium fertilizers as per soil test

cases.query: PM-KISAN aur Fasal Bima Yojana ka fayda kya hai, apply kaise karein?
cases.response_preview: PM-KISAN aur Fasal Bima Yojana se kisanon ko arthik madad milti hai. PM-KISAN mein 6000 rupees milte hain, Fasal Bima se fasal nuksan ka bima hota hai. Online apply kar sakte hain, ya official website par jaakar jaankari
